import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; const Worldwide = () =>{ const [data, setData] = useState([]) const getCovidData = async () =>{ const res = await fetch('https://corona.lmao.ninja/v2/countries'); const actualData = await res.json(); console.log(actualData.id) setData(actualData) } useEffect(() =>{ getCovidData(); },[]) return( <>

Covid 19 Tracker

{ data.map((curElem, index)=>{ return( ) }) }
Continent Country Cases Deaths todayDeaths TodayCases Recovered TodayRecovered Active critical casesPerOneMillion deathsPerOneMillion population tests testsPerOneMillion oneCasePerPeople oneDeathPerPeople oneTestPerPeople activePerOneMillion recoveredPerOneMillion criticalPerOneMillion
{curElem.continent} {curElem.country} {curElem.cases} {curElem.deaths} {curElem.todayDeaths} {curElem.todayCases} {curElem.recovered} {curElem.todayRecovered} {curElem.active} {curElem.critical} {curElem.casesPerOneMillion} {curElem.deathsPerOneMillion} {curElem.population} {curElem.tests} {curElem.testsPerOneMillion} {curElem.oneCasePerPeople} {curElem.oneDeathPerPeople} {curElem.oneTestPerPeople} {curElem.activePerOneMillion} {curElem.recoveredPerOneMillion} {curElem.criticalPerOneMillion} {curElem.affectedCountries}
) } export default Worldwide;
